postlist.title: My Laptop and Other Computers
postlist.excerpt: A webpage started by the disputed student notebook ownership 2012. Summarizing all the computers I have. The performance tests, OS, and usage guides. And also thoughts about how to upgrade or improve and maintain a perfect working condition.
postlist.text: A webpage started by the disputed student notebook ownership 2012. Summarizing all the computers I have. The performance tests, OS, and usag
